text: Nimen sui wei yu tamen fangshi, dan nimen yi queding gei tamen pinjin, jiaru nimen xiule tamen, name, nimen ying zeng yu nimen suoding pinjin de yiban, chufei tamen tongyi fangqi, huo shouchi hun yue de nanfang tongyi fangqi [bu kou ling yiban, zeng yu quanbu pinjin], fangqi [bu kou ling yiban pinjin] shi zui jiejin qianjing de. Nimen buyao wangji nimen zhi jian de zengpin. Fanshi nimen suo zuo de, an la que shi quan shi de.
